description: This Dart source file defines a Flutter widget called `RatingsTab`, which displays a list of ratings along with associated market data such as price and change percentage. It imports Flutter material components, provider package for state management, and local project widgets and providers.

classes.name: RatingsTab
classes.description: A stateless widget that builds a list view of rating items, showing symbol ratings and market quotes.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree, consuming RatingsProvider and MarketProvider to display a list of ratings with associated market data.
